title: Interpreting ocean acidification experiment data: Real-time graph collaborative learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Virtual lab environment utilizing digital sensors, emphasizing group collaboration activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between increased CO2 concentration and changes in ocean pH by analyzing real-time graph data.
Learners refine scientific reasoning through collaboration with peers during graph interpretation.
Learners identify discrepancies between experimental data and graphical representations and explain them in scientific contexts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
